Module presentationLayer
Package presentationLayer

Class ProductController

java.lang.Object
presentationLayer.ProductController
public class ProductController extends Object
This class manages the product-related CRUD operations in the application. Additionally, it manages the navigation between different views.
Author:
Ruben
